summary.span: 用作充当目录的所有区域控件的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as catalogs.

summary.span: 目录包含 控件的列表，用户可将这些控件添加到网页。

span.span: Catalogs contain lists of controls that users can add to a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是从类继承的基类 。The class is a base class that inherits from the class. 它提供派生区域的基本行为集。It provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones. 类提供 (UI) 的唯一用户界面，使用户能够将 控件和其他服务器控件添加到网页中。The class provides a unique user interface (UI) that enables users to add controls and other server controls to Web pages. 从类派生的控件（ 如 ）是实际放置在网页上的控件。Controls that derive from the class, such as , are the controls actually placed on Web pages. 它们充当其他控件（称为控件）的容器， 这些控件创建服务器控件的列表供用户添加到页面中。They act as containers for other controls, known as controls, that create lists of server controls for users to add to a page. 仅当页处于目录显示模式时，派生自类的区域才能出现。Zones that derive from the class can appear only when the page is in catalog display mode. > [!NOTE] > 区域只能包含 控件，相反， 控件只能驻留在区域中 。A zone can contain only controls, and conversely, controls can reside only in zones. 将服务器控件添加到目录的机制是从基类派生的下列三个控件集 。The mechanism for adding server controls to a catalog is the following set of three controls that derive from the base class. |控制Control|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||维护对页面上已关闭的控件的引用。Maintains references to controls that have been closed on a page. 您可以重新打开这些控件， (添加回用户) 的页面。These controls can be reopened (added back to the page) by users.| ||包含对在网页的标记中的 Web 部件目录中声明的控件的引用。Contains references to controls that are declared in a Web Parts catalog in the markup of a Web page. 用户可以将这些控件添加到网页。These controls can be added to a Web page by users.| ||为用户提供 UI，以将定义文件上传到目录，以便可以将该控件添加到网页中。Provides the UI for a user to upload a definition file to a catalog so that the control can be added to a Web page. 定义文件是带有的 XML 文件。导入控件的设置的 WebPart 文件扩展名。Definition files are XML file with a .WebPart file name extension that import settings for a control. 在导入定义文件之前，必须在服务器上显示该控件。The control must be present on the server before the definition file can be imported.| 类具有很多用于显示控件目录的属性 。The class has a number of properties that are useful for displaying catalogs of controls. 属性引用将选定控件从目录添加到页面的谓词，而 属性引用关闭目录并将页的显示模式返回到浏览模式的谓词。The property references the verb that adds a selected control from the catalog to the page, while the property references a verb that closes the catalog and returns the page's display mode to browse mode. 属性引用 区域中所有控件的集合。The property references the collection of all controls in the zone. 一些面向文本的属性（例如 、 和 ）重写基属性，以提供适合于目录的默认文本。Several text-oriented properties, such as , , and , override base properties to provide default text appropriate for catalogs. 属性包含下拉列表控件旁边的文本，该控件允许用户选择要将控件添加到哪个区域。The property contains the text alongside the drop-down list control that allows users to choose which zone a control will be added to. 类中包含多个其他属性 。Several other properties are included in the class. 属性是当前所选控件的唯一字符串标识符 。The property is a unique string identifier for the currently selected control. 属性指示是否显示可通过设置控件上的属性与控件相关联的图标 。The property indicates whether to show the icons that can be associated with controls by setting the property on a control. 属性包含 区域中当前未选定的控件的链接的样式特性。The property contains style attributes for the links to the controls that are not currently selected in the zone. 相反， 属性包含指向 用户当前在区域中选定的控件的链接的样式特性。In contrast, the property contains style attributes for a link to the control that the user has currently selected in the zone. 除了属性外，类中还有一些方法，还包括 从其他基控件继承的标准事件处理和呈现方法，这些方法是专为处理控件目录而设计的。In addition to the properties, there are also some methods in the class, in addition to the standard event-handling and rendering methods inherited from other base controls, which are uniquely designed for the purpose of handling catalogs of controls. 方法创建 chrome (外围用户界面元素，如边框、动词、图标和标题) 围绕区域中的每个 控件，还处理控件的呈现。The method creates the chrome (peripheral UI elements such as a border, verbs, icons, and a title) that surrounds each control in the zone, and also handles the rendering for the controls. 方法是抽象方法; 派生类将重写它，以创建 区域中包含的所有控件的实例。The method is an abstract method; derived classes override it to create instances of all the controls contained in the zone. 如果 区域中控件的集合出于某种编程原因发生更改，则派生类可以调用方法，而派生类则需要重新创建集合。The method can be called by a derived class if the collection of controls in the zone changes for some programmatic reason, and the derived class needs to recreate the collection. 每当页面回发到服务器时，该方法都将加载目录中控件旁边的复选框的以前存在状态 ; 相反，该 方法保存复选框的状态。The method loads the previously existing state for the check boxes next to the controls in the catalog, whenever the page is posted back to the server; conversely, the method saves the state of the check boxes. 最后， 方法为 包含在区域中的每个控件的链接提供所有呈现。Finally, the method provides all the rendering for the links to each control contained in the zone. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了类的几个声明性和编程使用 。The following code example demonstrates several declarative and programmatic uses of the class. 由于类是抽象类，因此代码示例使用 Web 部件控件集附带的派生类，其中演示了它从类继承的属性和方法 。Because the class is abstract, the code examples use the derived class that ships with the Web Parts control set, demonstrating the properties and methods that it inherits from the class. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - 包含对控件的引用的网页 ，以及演示某些键类成员使用情况的一些代码 。A Web page that contains a reference to a control, and some code that demonstrates usage of some key class members. - 添加到自定义控件的自定义控件 。A custom control that is added to the custom control. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。A description of how the example works in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件，使您可以更改页面上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables you to change display modes on the page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明，请参阅 [演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#8)] 此代码示例的第二部分是包含对控件的声明性引用的网页 。The second part of the code example is a Web page that contains a declarative reference to a control. 页面顶部附近有两个 `Register` 指令-一个用于用户控件，一个用于自定义 控件。Near the top of the page are two `Register` directives--one for the user control, and one for the custom control. 请注意，元素下面的元素 `` `` 包含对自定义控件的声明性引用 和 ASP.NET 控件。Notice that below the `` element is an `` element that contains declarative references to the custom control, and to an ASP.NET control. 区域还设置了各种标记和属性来确定其外观和行为。The zone also has a variety of tags and properties set to determine its appearance and behavior. `

para.span: 如果要开发用于承载控件的自定义区域 ，则必须确定是否要提供区域模板支持。

span.span: If you want to develop a custom zone for hosting controls, you must determine whether you want to provide zone template support.

para.span: 区域模板由实现接口的类型创建 ，如果要使页面开发人员能够使用自定义区域 在网页的声明性标记中引用区域中的控件，则这是必需的。

span.span: A zone template is created by types that implement the interface, and is necessary if you want to enable page developers using your custom zone to reference controls within your zone in the declarative markup of a Web page.

para.span: 如果需要区域模板支持，应从 类继承。

span.span: If you need zone template support, you should inherit from the class.

para.span: 相反，如果您的自定义区域及其 控件将是独立的，并且它们将以编程方式创建，而页面开发人员无需任何选项即可在区域模板中以声明方式指定控件，则可以直接从 类继承。

span.span: In contrast, if your custom zone and its controls are going to be self-contained, and they will be created programmatically without any options for page developers to specify controls declaratively in a zone template, then you can inherit directly from the class.

para.span: 如果从 类继承，则必须重写 方法，并将 或其他所需的服务器控件添加到 对象中。

span.span: If you inherit from the class, you must override the method, and add the or other server controls you want in your catalog to a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化派生类时调用构造函数，如 Web 部件控件集提供的类。The constructor is called when a derived class is initialized, such as the class provided with the Web Parts control set. 基本 构造函数通过将相应的对象传递给控件，帮助准备页，以显示 Web 部件目录用户界面 (UI) 。The base constructor helps prepare the page to display the Web Parts catalog user interface (UI), by passing the appropriate object to the control. 具体而言，构造函数传递一个 对象。Specifically, the constructor passes a object.

summary.span: 获取对 对象的引用，最终用户使用该对象可以将控件从目录添加到 Web 部件页。

value.span: ，最终用户可用来将控件从目录添加到网页。

span.span: A that enables end users to add controls from the catalog to a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加谓词由 派生自类的控件的属性引用 。The add verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. "添加谓词" 向网页添加最终用户在目录中选定的控件。The add verb adds a control that an end user has selected in the catalog to a Web page. 通常，add 谓词在用户界面中显示 (UI) 作为 控件，尽管它也可以是链接或图像。Typically, the add verb appears in the user interface (UI) as a control, although it can also be a link or an image. 添加谓词是一个区域级别的控件，这意味着虽然目录中可能有多个 控件，但 add 谓词适用于用户选择的所有控件，并将它们添加到所选区域。The add verb is a zone-level control, meaning that although there might be several controls in the catalog, the add verb applies to all the controls selected by the user and adds them to the selected zone. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式 和编程方式访问属性。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例的第一部分演示如何在网页中以 声明方式访问属性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 此示例自定义谓词的文本。This example customizes the text for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何 通过使用切换按钮来启用或禁用属性以编程方式访问属性。The second part of the example shows how to access the property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#3)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以从下拉列表中选择 " **目录** " 以切换到目录显示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 当目录可见时，可以在控件上检查添加谓词的自定义文本 ，您可以单击 "启用" 或 " **禁用谓词** " 按钮，以说明您可以通过编程方式访问应用谓词。When the catalog is visible, you can examine the customized text on the control for the add verb, and you can click the **Enable or Disable Verbs** button to demonstrate that you can access the apply verb programmatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法时，它将创建类的一个实例 ，并且此实例用于呈现外围用户界面 (UI) 元素 (也称为区域中所有控件的 chrome) 。When the method is called, it creates one instance of the class, and this instance is used to render the peripheral user interface (UI) elements (also called the chrome) for all controls in a zone. 单个控件的 chrome 元素 包含其边框和标题文本。The chrome elements for an individual control include its border and title text. 默认情况下，Web 部件控件集提供的控件不具有标头谓词。The controls provided with the Web Parts control set do not have header verbs by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对区域中所有控件的集合的引用 。The property provides a reference to a collection of all the controls in the zone. 它同时引用 随 Web 部件控件集提供的控件以及 添加到该区域中的任何自定义控件。It references both the controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and any custom controls that are added to the zone. 当另一个方法访问该属性时，该集合最初会创建 ，并且属性将调用 方法。The collection is initially created when another method accesses the property, and the property calls the method. > [!NOTE] > 请注意， 在方法的实现中添加到控件集合的任何都 必须为其 ID 属性分配一个值，否则，在将集合分配给属性时会引发异常 。Note that any that is added to the collection of controls in an implementation of the method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以 编程方式访问属性。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例演示如何访问 属性、循环访问集合，以及列出 区域中所有控件的 id。The code example shows how to access the property, iterate through the collection, and list the IDs of all the controls in the zone. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#4)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以从下拉列表中选择 " **目录** " 以切换到目录显示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 当目录可见时，可以单击 " **列表 CatalogParts** " 按钮以演示如何 访问属性。When the catalog is visible, you can click the **List CatalogParts** button to demonstrate how the property can be accessed.

summary.span: 将网页从目录显示模式切换到正常浏览模式。

span.span: Switches the Web page from catalog display mode to normal browse mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将忽略目录中当前选定的任何控件。The method ignores any currently selected controls in the catalog. 它只是调用 控件以将网页返回到浏览模式。It simply calls the control to return the Web page to browse mode.

value.span: ，最终用户可用来关闭网页上的目录用户界面。

span.span: A that enables end users to close the catalog UI on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Close 谓词由 派生自类的控件的属性引用 。The close verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 用户可以在区域页脚中单击 "关闭" 谓词。User can click the close verb in the zone footer. 当用户单击 "关闭" 谓词时， 用户选择的任何控件都将被忽略，目录 UI 会关闭，并且页面将返回到正常浏览模式。When the user clicks the close verb, any controls the user has selected are ignored, the catalog UI closes, and the page returns to normal browse mode. Close 谓词是一个区域级别的控件，这意味着其操作将应用于整个区域的级别。The close verb is a zone-level control, meaning that its action applies at the level of the whole zone. 当用户单击 "关闭" 谓词时，已选中但未添加到页面中的任何控件都将被忽略，目录将关闭，并且页面将返回到浏览模式。When a user clicks the close verb, any controls that have been selected but not added to the page are ignored, the catalog is closed, and the page returns to browse mode. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式 和编程方式访问属性。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例的第一部分演示如何在网页中以 声明方式访问属性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 此示例自定义 谓词的属性。This example customizes the property for the verb. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#3)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以从下拉列表中选择 " **目录** " 以切换到目录显示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 当目录可见时，通过将鼠标指针放在 " **关闭** " 按钮上，可以在工具提示中看到其说明文本。When the catalog is visible, by positioning your mouse pointer over the **Close** button, you can see its description text in a ToolTip. 您还可以单击 " **启用" 或 "禁用谓词** " 按钮，以演示您可以通过编程方式访问关闭谓词。You can also click the **Enable or Disable Verbs** button to demonstrate that you can access the close verb programmatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不提供实现。The method provides no implementation. 它应在派生类中实现，并且应用于在 承载网页进入目录模式时创建区域中包含的控件集合的实例。It is intended to be implemented in a derived class, and should be used to create an instance of the collection of controls contained in a zone, whenever the hosting Web page enters catalog mode. 方法提供方法的实现的一个示例 。The method provides one example of an implementation of the method. > [!NOTE] > 请注意， 在方法的实现中添加到控件集合的任何都 必须为其 ID 属性分配一个值，否则，在将集合分配给属性时会引发异常 。Note that any that is added to the collection of controls in an implementation of the method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the property. 方法可以 从多个源创建控件：在控件内以持久性格式声明的控件 ，或在各种存储机制（如 XML 文件或数据库）中保留的控件。The method can create the controls from several sources: controls that are declared in persistence format within a control, or controls that are persisted in various storage mechanisms, such as an XML file or a database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈现区域的正文区，该区域 是页眉和页脚区之间的主要内容区域，包含 控件。The method renders the body area of a zone, which is the main content area between the header and footer areas and contains controls. 方法会重写类中的基方法， 以提供专门呈现，用于寻址仅适用于区域的布局和样式特性 。The method overrides the base method in the class to provide specialized rendering that addresses layout and style attributes that apply only to zones. 方法将呈现一个表，其中包含正文的全部内容，并根据各种条件（包括区域中的控件数）设置不同的属性值 。The method renders a table that contains the entire contents of the body, and within that table, it sets different attribute values depending on various conditions, including how many controls are in the zone. 如果有多个 控件，则会为每个控件创建一个链接，并且仅显示当前所选控件的内容。If there are multiple controls, a link is created for each control, and only the contents of the currently selected control are displayed. 在 选定控件的属性 和当前未选定的控件的属性中设置特殊样式特性。Special style attributes are set in the property for the selected control versus the ones that are not currently selected. 如果 区域中没有任何控件，则此 方法将呈现属性的值 。If there are no controls in the zone, the method renders the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有多个控件，则方法将呈现指向区域中各个控件的链接 。The method renders links to the individual controls in a zone if there are multiple controls. 当前所选控件的链接以 不同的方式呈现，因此它从未选定的控件中突出显示。The link for the currently selected control is rendered differently so that it stands out from the unselected controls. 开发人员可分别使用和属性设置选定和未选定的控件链接的样式特性 。Developers can set the style attributes for the selected and unselected control links by using the and properties, respectively. 指向 区域中的控件的链接不是导航，它们用于显示控件 (UI) 的用户界面。The links to the controls in a zone are not navigational; they are for displaying the user interface (UI) of the controls. 当用户单击控件的链接时，将隐藏任何其他显示的控件的 UI，并显示所选控件的 UI。When a user clicks the link for a control, the UI for any other displayed control is hidden, and the UI for the selected control is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 区域的脚注是区域的 底部区域，其中包含区域级别的谓词，如 add 谓词和 close 谓词。The footer of a zone is the bottom area of the zone that contains the zone-level verbs such as the add verb and the close verb. 在基础标记中，页脚只是 HTML 表中的一个单元格。In the underlying markup, a footer is simply a cell in an HTML table. 方法首先为脚注创建样式属性，然后调用 方法以呈现添加和关闭谓词。The method first creates the style attributes for the footer, and then calls the method to render the add and close verbs.

summary.span: 保存在网页回发到服务器之后 控件状态发生的所有更改。

span.span: Saves any changes in a control's state that occur after the Web page is posted back to the server.
An that contains the state data for the control.

returns.span: 如果状态没有任何更改，则该方法返回 。

span.span: If there have been no changes to the state, the method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法涉及控件操作 (（如索引或关键字) ）所必需的状态数据，与控件的视图状态数据不同。The method is concerned with state data that is essential for a control's operation (such as an index or keyword) and is separate from the control's view-state data. 方法首先调用基方法来保存控件的现有状态数据。The method first calls the base method to save the existing state data for the control. 接下来， 通过检查属性是否有值来确定当前是否选中了区域中的控件 。Next, it determines whether a control in the zone is currently selected, by checking whether the property has a value. 如果有选定的控件，则该方法将使用所选控件中的状态数据更新现有状态数据，然后返回所有状态数据。If there is a selected control, the method updates the existing state data with the state data from the selected control, and then returns all the state data.

para.span: 您可以选择重写 派生类中的方法，以便可以更新区域中其他自定义对象的已保存控件状态。

span.span: You can optionally override the method in a derived class so that you can update the saved control state for other custom objects in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您为当前选定的控件设置所选标识符 。The property allows you to set an identifier of your choice for the currently selected control. 这不会更改控件的 属性值，因此可以将此属性用于自己的编程目的。This does not change the control's property value, so you can use this property for your own programmatic purposes. 例如，如果你想要在当前选定的控件上始终执行某些编程操作 ，此属性可让你通过提前设置的已知值访问该控件。For example, if you wanted to always carry out some programmatic action on the currently selected control, this property enables you to access that control through a known value that you set in advance. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式 和编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 请注意，代码示例的第一部分声明了两个 `` 元素，第一个部分声明属性的值 。Notice that the first part of the code example declares two `` elements, and the first one declares a value for the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 在代码示例的第二部分中，将 显示当前所选控件的属性的文本值。In the second part of the code example, the text value for the property of the currently selected control is displayed. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#6)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以从下拉列表中选择 " **目录** " 以切换到目录显示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 当目录可见时，单击某个控件的链接 以将其选中。When the catalog is visible, click one of the links to a control to select it. 然后单击 " **显示选定的 CATALOGPART ID** " 按钮以显示属性值。Then click the **Show Selected CatalogPart ID** button to display the property value. 请注意，属性的值是在区域中以声明方式设置的值。Notice that the value of the property is the value that was set declaratively for the zone. 如果选择 区域中的其他控件，则相同的值将成为 选定的每个控件的属性值。If you select the other controls in the zone, the same value becomes the value of the property for each control when it is selected. 如果未设置属性的值 ，则默认值始终为 当前所选控件的属性的值。If you do not set the value of the property, the default value is always the value of the property for the currently selected control.

summary.span: 曲目更改为区域控件的视图状态。

span.span: Tracks changes to a zone control's view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法首先调用类中的基方法 ，以跟踪与区域关联的视图状态 。The method first calls the base method in the class to track the view state associated with a zone. 接下来，该方法开始跟踪添加和关闭谓词的视图状态，以及 与和属性关联的对象 。Next, the method begins tracking the view state for the add and close verbs, as well as the objects associated with the and the properties.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
